content.yext/answer:
Our Dime 86th St branch has reopened as of April 4, 2020. Please check the [modified hours schedule](http://www.dime.com) before heading to any branch.

Thank you,

Your Dime Community Bank Team
content.yext/name: 86th St Branch Update - As of April 4, 2020
content.yext/question: 86th St Branch Update - As of April 4, 2020

 Vielen Dank,
 
 Ihr Dime Community Bank Team

Nuestra sucursal de Dime 86th St ha reabierto a partir del 4 de abril de 2020. Verifique el horario modificado antes de dirigirse a cualquier sucursal.
 
Gracias,
 
Su equipo de Dime Community Bank

content.yext/answer:
La nostra filiale Dime 86th St è stata riaperta dal 4 aprile 2020. Prima di recarti in qualsiasi filiale, controlla il programma orario modificato.

Grazie,

Il tuo team Dime Community Bank
